content: Hello! I opened my first PR (a small addition to the standard library) a few days ago, and since then have received some high-level feedback, but not much else. Since the addition definitely seems like something people have varying opinions on, would it be appropriate to request a pFCP be started at this point? If not, then what is the appropriate course of action? I've read through the guide to implementing new features but because my addition is specifically an impl (which are "insta-stable" per #55436), I'm not sure that everything applies (as I can't mark this as unstable).
@Kevin Svetlitski I've nominated it for team consideration.
Kevin Svetlitski has marked this topic as resolved.
